member.name: IMFCaptureEngineOnSampleCallback.OnSample
member.summary: Called when the capture sink receives a sample.
member.param: A pointer to the interface. Use this interface to get the time stamp, duration, and stream data. For more information, see Media Samples. This parameter can be NULL, so make sure to check for a NULL value before you dereference the pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureEngineOnSampleCallback
member.summary: Callback interface to receive data from the capture engine.
